en: Summons a ALL_SEEING_EYE that debuffs an enemy target with increased crit hit chance.
Summons a ANCESTRAL_MEMORIES, that gives damage boost to nearby MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs.
Summons a ANNUNAKI_SUNDIAL, spawns a beam of light that tracks enemies.
Summons a BLACK_CUBE, that increases damage of all nearby MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs, on enemy killed in range.
Summons a BUTTERFLY_EFFECT, that spawns a butterfly that has a chance to summon hurrican outside of it's range.
Summons a CRYSTAL_SKULLS, that spawns a crystal skull that summons a mayan calendar wheel that will damage enemies as it travels up the path.
Summons a FISH_RAIN, that spawns a rain of fish that attack nearby enemies.
Summons a FLUGELRAD_BASE, spawns Flugelrads to hunt down enemies.
At the start of an enemy wave, you will recieve a selection of Conspiracies to choose from.
Increases your HEMISYNC by %s at the end of each round.
The center of your shattered psyche, protect it at all costs.
The enemies in the game that are trying to return the player to the physical world.
Summons a MANI_WHEEL, that spawns a manni wheel that slows enemies in range.
A psychic construct that can be summoned to guard your KUNDALINI.
Summons a PHILOSOPHERS_STONE, that gives damage over time to all nearby enemies.
Reshuffle your deck and draw %s cards.
Discard all cards in hand, and draw an equal amount.
Summons a PYRAMID, Attacks nearby enemies with volleys of energy.
Gives a different selection of Conspiracies to choose from during GNOSIS.
Summons a SACRED_GEOMETRY, gives nearby MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs a chance to ricochet their attacks on hit.
Trashes a card out of your deck.
Summons a TUNING_FORK, that spawns a tuning fork that increases the attack speed of nearby towers.
Summons a UFO_PORTAL, that spawns UFOs that abduct enemies, taking them further back up along the path.
